about_the_game:
World Shadow - The Ultimate Urban Crime Experience
Step into the gritty underworld of World Shadow, an open-world action game set in the heart of Manhattan. As a rising member of a notorious gang, your ambition knows no bounds—you'll do whatever it takes to climb to the top, take control of the city, and eliminate anyone who stands in your way.

Current Version:
In this early version of World Shadow, you'll experience the core elements that define the game. Navigate through a detailed slice of Manhattan where you can drive a variety of vehicles, shooting pedestrian.

The Road Ahead:
The full version of World Shadow will expand far beyond what you see today. Get ready for a vast, living city where every decision you make shapes your rise to power. With a deep storyline featuring branching paths, a dynamic economy driven by your criminal activities, and the ability to manage and grow your own gang, World Shadow offers an unparalleled urban crime experience. Prepare to take over the city, one block at a time, and become the ultimate crime boss.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2130 | Core i5-9600k (VR) or AMD FX 4300 | Ryzen 5 2600X (VR)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6Gb) | GTX 1660Ti (VR) | RTX 2060 (RT) // AMD RX 480 | RX 590 (VR) | 6700XT (RT) // Intel Arc A380 (VR/RT)
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
